website_summaries.verdict: A copper coated rose gold set housed in a bamboo stand that will really impress your guests, and make some fun cocktails.
pros: Attractive copper coated rose gold set
Comes with Parisian cocktail shaker, jigger, muddler, strainers, and more tools to mix the perfect drink
cons: Shaker topper doesn't fit well after it's been opened and used

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My drinks tasted better... just kidding. Nice set. The quality seem excellent. My previous tool set gets mixed up and eventually lost or frustratingly hard to find in my drawer full of other stuff. The stand is a huge plus. Good for displaying and really good to keep things where I want it withing rummaging through the entire kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: YouMaybeRightIMaybeCrzy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this set. We get compliments on it all the time!!!
customer_reviews.author: senorazamora

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I adore this set! Looks fantastic, makes me feel like a rockstar bartender when I shake the shaker. Good quality, great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen V

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to make cocktails at home
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into a new spot and also just happened to get into martinis so I needed to get a bar set. This set was reasonably cheap and comes with everything you could possibly need for any cocktail (besides frozen drinks obviously). Everything looks great on the set and the bamboo stand adds a nice touch. My only gripe with this set would be that the shaker could have been a little bit bigger but this is a minor issue. They also give you a cocktail recipe guide which was a nice thoughtful addition.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kast

customer_reviews.title: Was thinner than I imagined and can damage easily
customer_reviews.text: the parts did not match in color, some rose gold mixed in with gold. that could have been because i ordered a 'used' one. Also had a small black mark that would not come off. i think this would be difficult to keep in new condition.According to washing instructions it is easy to pitt or lose original color. if you want it for decoration fine, but if you are going to be using it, be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Such great quality items and cute packaging, which I normally don’t care for, but it could be a great gift for drink enthusiasts. I was a little hesitant since the more popular sets were waaaaay pricier, but I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box and discovered a beautiful, functional stand and tools made out of heavy, polished metal. I’d definitely buy again, though I doubt I’ll have to replace this set any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: chupacabra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a writer who has to bartend to make a living. This set has received so many compliments and has become my signature at the bars, hotels and halls that I work at. The set is perfect. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: PAUL GREENFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this set. It is beautiful and because of that, it is almost almost a decoration for my bar top. So it really serves two purposes, it is functional and looks great. We received many compliments on this set. It is very nice quality and it was packaged very well. I would not hesitate to buy from this company again. My only complaint is that it does not include a bottle opener, although we are purchasing something to affix to the wall so that really is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Schnoor

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the cocktail shaker
customer_reviews.text: The cocktail shaker doesn't create a leakproof seal no matter how many times you try and adjust the top. The set is pretty much useless without a cocktail shaker. Very visually appealing set, but needs functionality improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Champagne Gold Bar Set
customer_reviews.text: This made a beautiful presentation and gift! Wood box not included.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Handy with an all in one accessory in bamboo stand.
customer_reviews.text: Small,sophisticated cocktail and mixed drink serving set with all the tools you need in a convenient and stylish bamboo storage.Copper coating is great.Lasting finish.Comes with 2 copper liquor pour spouts.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon P.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. The finish is super slick. The only thing I don’t like is the cutout for the muddler isn’t great, the muddler keeps leaning over, but that’s not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: misscelestia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set! It’s beautiful and such a great deal for the price. It also holds up very well after hand washing several times. I researched several different cocktail sets before purchasing and am so happy I went with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Litz

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one simple place!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Jillmo Bartender kit because we just bought a bar cart and wanted all the right tools to make a cocktail. This set is fabulous because it does not take up a lot of room on the cart and everything that you need to make a drink is easily accessible and nicely contained in the beautiful bamboo stand. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Grayce

customer_reviews.title: beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: looks wonderful sitting out.... make you feel rich when using... ;)
customer_reviews.author: LadyBags

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning!!
customer_reviews.text: One might think this is silly but I have never used this (some day I will). It so beautiful that I’m using it as decor on my bar. After I received it I purchased a cheap set that is kept under the bar for day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby M Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bar set for my husband for Father’s Day 2020 and he loves it! We got the copper style and it is so pretty that we keep it on the counter to show it off. He has made several mixed drinks with it and raves about it to his friends. Great price for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought two and couldn't be happier. We plan on gifting the other. Everything is easy to clean, super nice piece in our kitchen and enjoyed the little info book ours came with.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received had a different color top on the shaker. However, they quickly sent a new package and that was perfect. I really like everything in this set and the gold adds a nice prestigious look.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Verin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bartender set and the finish, definitely is good quality for the price I paid, one thing I would change if I could is instead of the lud months shaker being completely closed off I would have the tip of it open with a strain inside and a cap to prevent liquid getting out while shaking it.
customer_reviews.author: PyRo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful and came in perfect condition. Perfect for any fan of rose gold. The only bummer is it is not dishwasher safe, but it was pretty easy to clean everything. The best part is everything feels well made and actually works. The bonus is this set looks great on display as well.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition to My Bar!
customer_reviews.text: It's so pretty and well made, it sits on top of the bar so I can look at it. Really pretty color that goes well with the bamboo frame.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: All the bar necessities.
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces you would need for a bar. My husband loved the black stainless color.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily at work and it is easy to clean. Love that I can tell mine apart from coworkers
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this bartending kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love my set. It’s so classy! I’m enjoying using it at on my mini bar at home. It’s perfect for entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy R.

customer_reviews.title: Shot glass doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: The sizing doesn’t match up with the storage space and the shot glass. Either the wooden portion was cut incorrectly or the wrong shot glass was sent.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!!!! Perfect kit for anyone. You can be a total noob or a pro this will meet your needs. Super complete, good material and looks so COOL on my home bar
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how this looks so cute on my bar counter. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Home Bar
customer_reviews.text: I love these tools they look so nice on my bar . so nice don't want to use it lol . makes the bar look fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful set! I got it for my home bar and it’s so pretty that I almost don’t want to use it! I can’t speak to the use because I haven’t gotten around to using it, but I love how it looks on my bar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mix match set
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited for this all light gold set but when I opened it the mixer and tongs were silver. The rest was the light gold color in the picture that I ordered. Now I just have a mix-match set.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! It shipped right away and was easy to assemble. It comes with a little book of recipes to get you started which was fun for us to try out some new drinks with. It has a clean, sharp look, and the stand is incredibly convenient to have with it. Overall very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: McKenna BeLow

customer_reviews.title: As perfect as possible for less than $50
customer_reviews.text: For less than $50 this is pretty good. If you look closely the product isn't perfect, a couple minor scratches, etc. But hey it's less than $50. Also the bamboo stand is quite nice and solid. Looks amazing on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Connor Roach

customer_reviews.title: Great Set - Has Everything I need
customer_reviews.text: Broke this set in at a housewarming party and it gave us everything we needed to make cocktails for our friends. Nothing too fancy, but the items are of good quality and weight and they cleaned well in the dishwasher. I would gift this set to someone setting up a new bar.
customer_reviews.author: Skayg5

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great set for the price! The only issue was half the set came in gold and the other half in more of a rose gold. Kind of a bummer but other than that it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Coleman

customer_reviews.title: My bar tools do not all fit into the wholes:(
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo whole for the measuring jigger is to small and will not fit in the bamboo catty:( ugh
customer_reviews.author: Chef V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I feel like a real bartender when making my drinks! They look great as decor too!
customer_reviews.author: aly falinski

customer_reviews.title: The color is exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The color is exactly like the picture! I thought it was gonna be more of a bronze color rather than the color in the photo but it's true to the product.
customer_reviews.author: danielle r.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bar Kit
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great and they look amazing. Everything is exactly as pictured. I’m excited to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bouchett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was just what I was looking for to go on my bar cart. Great set that is easy to use and easy to clean. Looks good with the wood stand that could go anywhere! Thank you for such a good product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hatley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend. It looked beautiful out of the box and my friend loves it. Not sure about it’s durability.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Great for Entertaining Guest
customer_reviews.text: This bar set looks absolutely gorgeous when out entertaining guest. I was very shocked at how good the quality really is. All my guest commented on how nice it was. So happy I invested.
customer_reviews.author: Hadijah

customer_reviews.title: The stand is perfect and it’s worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product came with speedy accurate delivery. I love it already. All of my items where there and they all work 😍. The stand that it comes with is perfect! Makes the kit easily portable. You can even keep it in the small Jillmo box it comes to travel with. Would definitely recommend buying it if you want all of the things you need for a kit. And the color makes it stylish !
customer_reviews.author: chris marie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: At first we bought it as a gift to our friends, and once we saw how amazing it is we ordered another one for us, and also another friend of us asked us order him too. Don't hesitate!

customer_reviews.title: A splash of Color for the Bar!
customer_reviews.text: It’s bar ware but also it elevates it to another level by looking so elegant!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Everyone kept talking about it and giving compliments at the last party.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and high-quality! Very shiny copper/rose-gold color looks just like the pictures. Looks amazing on my Art Deco-themed bar cart!

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: The copper set is gorgeous and the quality of the tools are impeccable.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged nicely and we were able to gift with out an issue.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty kit
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to angle the cap of the shaker a little bit to avoid leakage.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: excellent products good quality, perfect for a present and for myself!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bar tool kit, almost too pretty to use. If used a lot doesn’t hold up so pretty though

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product - gorgeous to display on a bar cart!
customer_reviews.author: Reagan McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and handy!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set! The stand is a bonus, making it a lovely set piece in the kitchen. It’s everything you need to get you drink in style. I highly recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice gift to give and thing to have.The setup is great!

customer_reviews.title: Would reccommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning!! My husband is always asking me to make him cocktails so this was really the perfect gift for both of us.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this for our personal bartending "kit" and it was easy to wash and looks pretty on our kitchen counter!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Denney

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set! Goes perfectly on our dry sink cabinet that has copper accents.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: The material is of excellent quality, the bamboo stand goes well with the copper style. A great accessory to have.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Super cute and would make for a perfect gift. Sturdy and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: This product is stylish & functional.
customer_reviews.text: Good for a beginner to an advanced bartender. Great addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Iaffaldano

customer_reviews.title: Product looks fantastic and works great
customer_reviews.text: Product looks fantastic and works great. Customer service was excellent as the company kept in contact with me until the product arrived
customer_reviews.author: Lane Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a high quality yet affordable bar kit. This one nails it!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Comer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set and everything you need to make drinks.
customer_reviews.author: william secor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the recipient absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette J. Ahasteen

customer_reviews.title: Easily scratched!
customer_reviews.text: I was deeply disappointed by the poor quality of the finish. The top part shaker is so easily scratched to the point that after a few cocktails nights we noticed copper particles in some of our drinks. Not safe for use, not happy at all :(
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: ugly scratches after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: The stand is nice, but the bar tools are of poor quality. Scratches appeared all over the material coating.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Not as quality as it looks in the photos
customer_reviews.text: I really hoped that this copper set would be good because of its high price. But it really seems like they didn't do any quality control. The wooden base has loose joints, and it looks like it's just held together with some pins because I can see some not-so-attractive pin holes.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Shaker top doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice and has everything you need. Except the top doesn’t fit on the shaker so it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Welch

customer_reviews.title: Different shades of gold ???
customer_reviews.text: Different colored golds for some unknown reason. Three of the items look like the expected champagne gold and the rest look like a faded rose gold. The product pictures actually kind of shows it but it’s more noticeable in person.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & matches my style perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! The feel is so smooth, good quality copper coating. The bamboo stand is perfect on top of my counter or bar and really helps keep things organized. I also loved that it came with a little recipe book. I made the cucumber martini and it was sooo good. Would definitely recommend or buy another to gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gold set - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this! I bought it to go on my brass and glass bar cart and it really pulls the entire look together. I have received many compliments on the set. I use it regularly for mixed cocktails and the pieces are very easy to clean (though I always wash them by hand immediately after use). They make me happy to use and it feels like a real event to make cocktails now. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: WOW So much nicer in person!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this set is so much more pretty in person. It was a hit at my recent party and I plan to use it again soon. It is such a complete set and is a perfect gift for any host or for you if you love to host yourself. Definitely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set
customer_reviews.text: I would only say if you, like me am use to a strainer in the shaker lid then be aware there isn't one. Granted they provide several strainers and it is a VERY minor step to use them to strain I must have missed this in the description. That being said it is lovely and the shaker makes my martini ice cold!!!!!! Looks great on the bar too
customer_reviews.author: Mikee

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I am new to bartending and wanted something I could practice with at home. I love this set it feels really high quality, so far I’ve only used it once, but it was really easy to use and clean afterward. I really love the stand for it to, everything fits perfect out of the way. This would make a great gift. I would recommend this set to people who know what they are doing or just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Copper coated accessories make a nice display. Shaker does not have openings in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Copper coated accessories make a nice display. Shaker does not have openings in the cap (which avoids leaks after shaking and opening with some shakers) but this is easily remedied by pouring with the enclosed strainer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only critique of this kit is that the muddler holder is poorly designed - the muddler falls over / falls out. Otherwise, this is great and we’re happy with the purchase. We especially like the shaker in comparison with others we’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: I picked it because the black metallic look is more elegant. I also jazzed it up with grey spray paint to match our kitchen colors. It’s well made and very usable.
customer_reviews.author: Texas proud

customer_reviews.title: Use this all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband, but we now both use it all the time! It's really nice to have a stand that everything fits in as well! I only wish it came with a lemon/lime juicer, but it was definitely worth the price!! Too much fun!
customer_reviews.author: FruitChunks

customer_reviews.title: Shines like anew penny
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty! I wanted a fancy bar set and this is it. Literally shines like a new penny. I also purchased a small bar mat and cocktail hour is more fun with these tools.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, photos don’t do it justice. Incredibly happy with this item.

customer_reviews.text: I love this set! It looks beautiful and I love the fact that it comes with the bamboo stand, so it keeps all the itmes organized. I definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: A beautiful set true to the pic, makes a great hostess gift.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product. So far it seems well manufactured, I love the color, and has all the pieces I was looking for.

customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly what I wanted. It came complete and all pieces are in great condition without any damages and works perfectly.

product_meta.title: Jillmo Pro Martini Bartender Kit Copper Coated Rose Gold Stainless Steel Bar Set with Bamboo Stand - 19 oz Parisian Gold Cocktail Shaker with Bar Accessories …
feature_bullets: Complete Set and Great Value » All essential bartender set of serious quality cocktail tools. Parisian cocktail shaker with a 19oz capacity /hawthorne Strainer Julep Strainer Fine Strainer /10 inch cocktail muddler and 12 inch twisted mixing spoon /highly-elastic ice tongs and pourers /1oz-2oz double jigger/water- proof japanese style bamboo holder. Whether you're a professional bartender or a beginner, whether you’re setting up a bar at home or at work - Jillmo’s bar set is the wise choice.

HIGH QUALITY DURABLE AND RUSTPROOF » This entire bar accessories kit is made of the highest quality stainless steel with a shiny mirror finish, bright and durable. Unlike similar products who rust easily, Jillmo’s cocktail martini shaker set is guaranteed rustproof and leak-proof, remain on your bar for many years to come!

Stylish VELVET Bamboo Holder FOR STORAGE » A stylish bamboo stand make all accessories a whole, more neatly and impressively, impress friends and family at parties and get-togethers. Carefully designed bamboo holder to keep your barware tools away from scratching. This cocktail kit with stylish holder display in your home bar or bar will definitely win your guest’s attention!
CAUTION » Copper-coated items are highly recommended to wash by hand, DO NOT use any metal cleaning utensils as this can scratch the surfaces of the stainless steel items.
100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: If for any reason, your Jillmo bartendering set proves to be unsatisfied, just contact us, we provide a full refund.
